syntax.title: Invalid Syntax
syntax.description: Please see the help menu for more information.

wager.title: Invalid Wager
wager.description: Your wager must be a positive amount and you cannot bet more than you own.

user.title: Invalid User
user.description: The given user either doesn't exist or has yet to be cached!

command.title: Command not found
command.description: The given command cannot be found. To view the list of commands, type "$help"

noItemErr.title: Item not found
noItemErr.description: The given item does not exist. To view the Spike Shop, type "$help shop"

ownedItemErr.title: Already owned
ownedItemErr.description: You already own this item, you silly goose!

tooPoorErr.title: Insufficient funds
tooPoorErr.description: You do not have sufficient funds.

clearTooBigErr.title: Number too large
clearTooBigErr.description: Input a number that is less than 100.

clearTooSmallErr.title: Number too small
clearTooSmallErr.description: Input a number that is at least 2.

invalidPermsErr.title: Invalid Permissions
invalidPermsErr.description: This command requires special permissions to perform.

invalidBetPartsErr.title: Invalid Syntax
invalidBetPartsErr.description: Wrong number of bet arguments: Expected 3

NanBetAmtErr.title: NaN Amount
NanBetAmtErr.description: Bet or Win amount is not a number.

betNonPosErr.title: Non-positive bet/win amount
betNonPosErr.description: Bet or Win amount is not > 0.

invalidEndPartsErr.title: Invalid Syntax
invalidEndPartsErr.description: Got wrong number of parameters to end bet.

invalidEndBetIdErr.title: Invalid ID
invalidEndBetIdErr.description: Cannot end a bet with this ID.

notBetOwnerErr.title: Not Bet Creator
notBetOwnerErr.description: Only the creator of the bet can close the bet.

cannotPayBettor.title: Cannot Pay Bettor
cannotPayBettor.description: A bettor cannot be paid. Contact maintainers or see error logs for more information.

multipleMessageReaction.title: Multiple Messages Found Reacted To
multipleMessageReaction.description: Expected one message reacted to, got multiple.

betOwnerBets.title: Bet Owner Cannot Bet on Own Bet
betOwnerBets.description: A bet owner tried to bet on their own bet, which they cannot do.

transaction.title: Transaction Error
transaction.description: An error occurred when making a Spike Bucks transaction.

invalidAnnouncePartsErr.title: Syntax Error
invalidAnnouncePartsErr.description: Wrong number of arguments for announcement: Expected 2

incvalidChallengeIdErr.title: Invalid Challenge ID
incvalidChallengeIdErr.description: Please submit code for a valid challenge.

alreadySubmittedChallengeErr.title: Already Submitted
alreadySubmittedChallengeErr.description: You already submitted passing code for this challenge! If you wish to remove your entry, contact Joshua Maxwell.
